detailsData.title: Experienced Trial Lawyers
detailsData.content: With trial experience spanning four decades, we have successfully defended over 200 cases in trial or arbitration.

detailsData.title: Dedicated Legal Team
detailsData.content: Our attorneys personally manage each case to ensure excellent communication and quality representation.

detailsData.title: Commitment to Diversity
detailsData.content: Certified by WBENC as a Women’s Business Enterprise and a member of NAMWOLF.

address: 1000 Wilshire Boulevard, 19th Floor, Los Angeles, California 90017-2427
subHeading: A medical malpractice defense law firm
valueProp: Taylor DeMarco LLP is a civil defense law firm specializing in medical and dental malpractice cases, with a dedicated team of experienced attorneys.

testimonalData.text: Taylor DeMarco's legal team is exceptional. They provided me with the support and protection I needed during a challenging malpractice case.
testimonalData.author: Dr. Smith

testimonalData.text: I am grateful for the dedication and passion shown by Taylor DeMarco's lawyers in defending my case. Their expertise is unmatched.

testimonalData.text: Taylor DeMarco LLP exceeded my expectations in handling my medical malpractice defense. Their commitment to excellence is commendable.
